DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, non-randomized, multi-center study to assess safety and long-term patency of the ostia treated with the XprESS device per the device indication for use (IFU).
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Scheduled to undergo sinus surgery with planned use of the XprESS Balloon Device consistent with the tool's Indication for Use Willing and able to provide consent Known Samter's Triad History of primary ciliary dysfunction History of cystic fibrosis Known to be immunosuppressed Hemophilia Currently enrolled in another preapproval investigational study
